com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.itemmanipulation.dragdrop

Class GripView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.itemmanipulation.dragdrop.GripView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class GripView
extends android.view.View
    A View which shows a number of colored dots in a grid.
